welcome_message_body: Welcome to Chicacao, Guatemala! Known for its stunning natural beauty and rich cultural heritage, we invite you to immerse yourself in the charm of our city and explore all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Base Aerea Del Sur Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Base Aerea Del Sur Airport is used for transporting goods and packages.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Quetzaltenango Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Quetzaltenango Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
